Trade/Device Name(s): Macro & Micro-Test HCG Pregnancy Test Midstream
Submitter Information: Jiangsu Macro & Micro-Test Med-Tech Co., Ltd.
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Macro & Micro-Test HCG Pregnancy Test Midstream, an over-the-counter qualitative lateral flow immunoassay for urine detection of hCG to aid early pregnancy detection.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for over-the-counter use for qualitative detection of hCG hormone in urine to aid early detection of pregnancy.
